Konvey is a cutting-edge video messaging software designed for effective communication, onboarding new customers, educating audience and providing stellar service support to customers.

It’s simple, fun and easy to use. Essentially, you can use it to reach customers, convince them to buy new product and get a thoughtful feedback or testimonial from them.

What’s so special about Konvey?

We understand that as a busy entrepreneur, typing out lengthy emails and sitting through endless meetings can be time-consuming and, at times, tedious. That's why we are thrilled to introduce Konvey, a game-changing video messaging software designed to help you overcome these challenges and enhance your business communications like never before!

Why Choose Konvey?

Here are some of the incredible features that make Konvey stand out from the rest:

1️. Seamless User Experience: Our user-friendly interface makes recording and sending video messages a breeze. In just a few taps, you can share your thoughts and feelings in the most expressive way possible.

2️. Personalized Communication: With Konvey, you can record personalized videos or screen tailored to each recipient. Say goodbye to generic messages and hello to meaningful connections.

3️. Video Request: Because there's often not enough time for one-on-ones to talk about everything in detail and receive thoughtful feedback. Konvey let you request a video feedback from customers at a time that suites them.

4️. Reach Clients Like Never Before: Konvey will automatically generate a video link or embed code for you, which makes it super easy to share your video in an email or document.

5️. Build trust with Branding: Konvey will let you add a custom domain and business logo to brand your video request link. This will let you build more trust and relationships with your customers, which can eventually turn them into loyal customers.

Who can benefit from Konvey?

The possibilities are endless! Konvey caters to a wide range of users, including:

1. Families: Strengthen your family bonds by sharing special moments, celebrations, and updates through heartwarming video messages.

2. Professionals: Build stronger professional relationships with colleagues and clients by sending personalized video updates, thank-you notes, or project updates.

3. Business Owners: Stand out from the competition by using Konvey for marketing, customer support, and engaging with your audience on a personal level.

4. Educators: Create engaging and interactive video lessons to keep students motivated and interested in learning.

5. Social Influencers: Connect with your followers in a more authentic way through video messages and exclusive content.

You can sign up for free, no credit card required. Konvey offers Free and Paid Plans.
